title: Head of International Customer Support (m/f/x) gefunden bei Amann Girrbach AG Jobportal
subtitle: Koblach (AUT), V 6842
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

Amann Girrbach is one of the world’s leading companies in the field of dental technology. The company group develops, produces and sells products and system solutions for the manufacture of high-precision and aesthetic dental prostheses. Our success is based on passion, competence and enthusiasm of more than 500 committed employees working at all of its six locations.

Key responsibilities

  • Lead a team of 3-10 international helpdesk agents
  • Tier 2 and 3 support for Amann Girrbach products
  • Develop and run helpdesk training methodology and knowledge tranfer and implement into organization
  • Responsible for building up tier 1 and 2 helpdesks in our international HUBs

Job requirements

  • Completed studies in Mechanical Engineering
  • Leadership experience required for more than 5 years
  • Digital Dental prosthetics background
  • Technical service experience in dental machinery
  • Ability to drive complex projects with multi-functional teams
  • Very good communication skills in English, Spanish, Portuguese and basic German
  • Excellent MS-Office skills as well as Exocad Software support knowledge 
  • Analytical skills, a high degree of assertiveness and a hand-on mentality
  • Independent working style and a high sense of responsibility
  • Strong communication skills

Opportunities

  • Work in an international, fast-growing company that shows high esteem for engagement, performance and personal commitment
  • Open communication and respectful cooperation are defining features of our corporate culture
  • Attractive financial framework conditions of a modern company make our package a perfect fit for a committed individual
